data.content:
Danh từ
sự không tin
he listened in disbelief to this extraordinary story
nó lắng nghe câu chuyện kỳ lạ này mà lòng không tin

noun
[noncount] :a feeling that you do not or cannot believe or accept that something is true or real
The initial reports were met with widespread disbelief. [=many people did not believe the reports]
She stared at him in utter disbelief.
If you want to enjoy this story, you have to suspend your disbelief. [=allow yourself to believe things that cannot be true] - compare unbelief
